sentences.english: He is a physically active, super—curious and highly inquisitive boy.
sentences.chinese: 他是一位體力活躍，非常好奇以及很好問的男孩。

sentences.english: To trust my inner knowingness and take action accordingly… in personal and professional actions.
sentences.chinese: 信任內在的覺知，要身體力行，並且是專業化的行動。

sentences.english: The labor song is the oldest ballad directly originating from physical labor.
sentences.chinese: 勞動歌是由體力勞動直接激發起來的最古老的歌謠。

sentences.english: The two old pensioners have by this time recovered and dressed themselves.
sentences.chinese: 這時候，兩個老人已經恢復了體力，穿回衣服。

sentences.english: Don't focus a lot on intense strength training if slim and trim is your goal.
sentences.chinese: 如果纖瘦修長是你的目標，就不要做太多的體力訓練。

sentences.english: Stress depletes both energy and motivation.
sentences.chinese: 壓力不僅消耗體力而且讓你喪失動力。

sentences.english: But I must kill him and keep strong to do it.
sentences.chinese: 然而我一定要保持體力，等着把它給宰了。

sentences.english: Physically he has already proven that he can outplay anyone.
sentences.chinese: 他已經證明了他的體力勝過任何人。

sentences.english: He decided to overcome his physical weaknesses through exercise and hard work.
sentences.chinese: 他決定通過鍛鍊和重體力勞動來克服體質的病弱。

sentences.english: It is a time of rest, refection, and renewal.
sentences.chinese: 這是一個時間的休息，恢復體力，並更新。

sentences.english: Pubic region inside spirit of how many, determine the an ugg tall the martials physical strength.
sentences.chinese: 丹田裏面氣的多少，決定一位武者的體力。

sentences.english: The postindustrial economy is indifferent to men’s size and strength.
sentences.chinese: 後工業經濟無關男子的身材和體力。

sentences.english: They know the rewards are there if you're prepared to get your hands dirty.
sentences.chinese: 他們很清楚弄髒雙手幹體力活的報酬有多麼優厚。

sentences.english: Introduction to Fluid Mechanics, International Student Version, 7th Edition.
sentences.chinese: 流體力學概論，國際學生版，第7版。

sentences.english: Furthermore, some people are not clear about the differences between physical labor and sports training.
sentences.chinese: 部分羣衆對體力勞動和體育鍛煉這兩者混淆不清。

sentences.english: The infrared ray warms up the magnetic force treatment, ameliorative blood circulation, instauration physical strength.
sentences.chinese: 紅外線溫熱磁力治療，改善血液循環，恢復體力。

definition: to toughen/to temper/to engage in physical exercise/to work out/(fig.) to develop one's skills/to train oneself
to test/to put to the test/trial/ordeal
